treatment-md.title: Brevitibius polyptychus Mwabvu, Hamer & Slotow, 2007, comb. n.
treatment-md.article-title: A taxonomic review of the southern African millipede genus, Bicoxidens Attems, 1928 (Diplopoda: Spirostreptida: Spirostreptidae), with the description of three new species and a tentative phylogeny
